price: Kõ waɗanda suka yãgi miyãgun ayyuka sunã zaton Mu sanyã su kamar waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, su zama daidai ga rãyuwarsu da mutuwarsu? Abin da suke hukuntãwa yã mũnanã!
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱجۡتَرَحُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن نَّجۡعَلَهُمۡ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ سَوَآءٗ مَّحۡيَاهُمۡ وَمَمَاتُهُمۡۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحۡكُمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasiba alladhīna ij'taraḥū al-sayiāti an najʿalahum ka-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti sawāan maḥyāhum wamamātuhum sāa mā yaḥkumūna
